title: Post-Impressionists
creator_credit: International Film Bureau, Egons Tomsons and George Barford
brief_description: Surveys the aims, influences and techniques of Cezanne, Gauguin, Van Gogh, Seurat, and Toulouse-Lautrec. Indicates how the experiments and work of these artists led to different movements in modern painting.
creator_credit_for_label: International Film Bureau, Egons Tomsons and George Barford
